greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of ways the n-th triangular number T(n) = A000217(n) can be written as the sum of two positive triangular numbers.
comment: The order doesn't matter. 21 = 6+15 = 15+6 are not counted as distinct solutions. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 22 2020
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
maple: a:= proc(n) local h, j, r, w; h, r:= n*(n+1), 0;
for j from n-1 by -1 do w:= j*(j+1);
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 01 2019
